title: Analyze Subscriber Churn Reasons
description: An agent needs to analyze the reasons given by subscribers who cancelled their service in the last month.

tasks.description: Retrieve all cancellation data from the last month, including the logged reasons.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls a dataset of all churned subscribers and their stated reasons.

tasks.description: Categorize and quantify the cancellation reasons.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the top reasons are 'Price' (40%), 'Lack of new content' (30%), and 'Technical issues' (15%).

tasks.description: Generate a report summarizing the findings for the executive team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear, concise report on the primary drivers of churn.
